column5: Went out to seek the 40 plus inchers today,as well as a few bass. 2 tail walking bass spit out my bait,3 missed pike and 4 landed.Camera died when I went to take a pic of the 4rth. Even though they were small,they were surely fun to catch!And agressive as well! Gotta love it!BIG or small!
i find that the smaller hammer handles are great to living up a slow day.  they sure do jump, splash and trash around!  Cheers!
